text: Myrcia paganii is a species of plant in the family Myrtaceae. It is endemic to Puerto Rico. Myrcia paganii is listed as endangered by the United States and Puerto Rico. It is classified as a perennial tree or shrub.USDA Plants Profile. There is a US Fish and Wildlife recovery plan in process.USFWS. Recovery Plan for Myrcia paganii and the Auederodendron pauciflorum. September 1997. ==References== paganii Category:Endemic flora of Puerto Rico Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myrcia paganii
